name: The Virus 2019
description:
The Virus 2019 

It is a game made on the pandemic COVID-19 which is a very dangerous disease these days. I thought to encourage people by making a game on the pandemic corona will be very good. I thought that people will be encouraged to wear mask and maintain precautions that can stop this deadly virus from  Spreading .I am only  a boy of 14 years and I created this game. If you think there are any problems in the game then please forgive me. I will try solving all these problems if I created a new version of this game. You can check the controls below and If you have any advice for me or want to contact me then you can send me a friend request on Discord. My id is Giant#1099. 

You can use up and down arrow to play the game 

H to go back to home 

P to  pause 

R to Restart and S to start after restarting 

Thank You
